languages.text: {n}Помедлив, Паскаль склоняет голову, и из {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} его начинает звучать бинарный реквием.{/n} "Несмотря на его заблуждения, он был слугой {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Помедлив, Паскаль склоняет голову, и из {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} его начинает звучать бинарный реквием.{/n} "Несмотря на его заблуждения, он был слугой {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}After a pause, Pasqal bows his head, and a binharic requiem pours out of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Despite his misconceptions, he was a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}Помедлив, Паскаль склоняет голову, и из {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g} его начинает звучать бинарный реквием.{/n} "Несмотря на его заблуждения, он был слугой {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}After a pause, Pasqal bows his head, an a binary requiem pours out of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Despite his misconceptions, he was a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}After a pause, Pasqal bows his head, and a binharic requiem pours out of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Despite his misconceptions, he was a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}After a pause, Pasqal bows his head, and a binharic requiem pours out of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Despite his misconceptions, he was a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}少し止まった後、パスカルは頭を下げ、彼の{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}からはビンハリックの鎮魂歌が聞こえてきた。{/n}「誤った認識があったにもかかわらず、彼は{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の従者だったのです」
languages.original_text: {n}After a pause, Pasqal bows his head, and a binharic requiem pours out of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Despite his misconceptions, he was a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}少し止まった後、パスカルは頭を下げ、彼の{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}からはビンハリックの鎮魂歌が聞こえてきた。{/n}「誤った認識があったにもかかわらず、彼は{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の従者だったのです」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡顿了顿，随后低下了头，{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置颂唱着二进制语言的安魂曲。{/n}“尽管他误会了我，但他毕竟是{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的仆人。”
languages.original_text: {n}After a pause, Pasqal bows his head, and a binharic requiem pours out of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Despite his misconceptions, he was a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡顿了顿，随后低下了头，{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}装置颂唱着二进制语言的安魂曲。{/n}“尽管他误会了我，但他毕竟是{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}的仆人。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Nach einer Pause senkt Pasqal den Kopf, und ein binhäres Requiem ertönt aus seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}.{/n} "Er war trotz seiner Fehleinschätzungen ein Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}After a pause, Pasqal bows his head, and a binharic requiem pours out of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Despite his misconceptions, he was a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer Pause senkt Pasqal den Kopf, und ein binäres Requiem ertönt aus seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g}.{/n} "Er war trotz seiner Fehleinschätzungen ein Diener des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Après une courte pause, Pasqal baisse la tête et un requiem binhaire s'élève de son {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} « Quelles qu'aient été ses erreurs, il n'en demeurait pas moins un fidèle serviteur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}After a pause, Pasqal bows his head, and a binharic requiem pours out of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Despite his misconceptions, he was a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après une courte pause, Pasqal baisse la tête et un requiem binhaire s'élève de son {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} « Quelles qu'aient été ses erreurs, il n'en demeurait pas moins un fidèle serviteur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Al cabo de una pausa, Pasqal inclina la cabeza y un réquiem binario brota de su {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco sintetizador{/g}.{/n} «A pesar del malentendido, era un siervo fiel del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}After a pause, Pasqal bows his head, and a binharic requiem pours out of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Despite his misconceptions, he was a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Al cabo de una pausa, Pasqal inclina la cabeza y un réquiem binario brota de su {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vocosintetizador{/g}.{/n} «A pesar del malentendido, era un siervo fiel del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Kısa bir duraksamanın ardından başını eğen Pasqal'ın {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voksundan{/g} ikilidil bir ölüm ilahisi dökülüyor.{/n} "Yanlış fikirlerde olmasına rağmen {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} hizmetkârıydı."
languages.original_text: {n}After a pause, Pasqal bows his head, and a binharic requiem pours out of his {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g}.{/n} "Despite his misconceptions, he was a servant of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal kısa bir duraksamanın ardından başını eğiyor ve {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g}undan ikilidil bir ölüm ilahisi dökülüyor.{/n} "Yanlış fikirlerde olmasına rağmen {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}'in bir hizmetkârıydı."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
